EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

AccountsPayableAndOtherAccruedLiabilitie.label: Accounts Payable and Other Accrued Liabilities, Current
AccountsPayableAndOtherAccruedLiabilitie.description: Amount of liabilities incurred to vendors for goods and services received, and accrued liabilities classified as other, payable within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AccountsPayableCurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Current
AccountsPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccountsReceivableNetCurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AccountsReceivableNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

AccruedIncomeTaxesCurrent.label: Accrued Income Taxes, Current
AccruedIncomeTaxesCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all currently due domestic and foreign income tax obligations.

AccruedIncomeTaxesNoncurrent.label: Accrued Income Taxes, Noncurrent
AccruedIncomeTaxesNoncurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the unpaid sum of the known and estimated amounts payable to satisfy all domestic and foreign income tax obligations due beyond one year or the operating cycle, whichever is longer. Alternate captions include income taxes payable, noncurrent.

AccruedLiabilitiesForCommissionsExpenseA.label: Accrued Liabilities for Commissions, Expense and Taxes
AccruedLiabilitiesForCommissionsExpenseA.description: The carrying amount for commissions, taxes and other expenses that were incurred but unpaid as of the balance sheet date.

AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Property, Plant, and Equipment
AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization for physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossN.description: Accumulated change in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, net of tax effect, at period end. Excludes Net Income (Loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners. Includes foreign currency translation items, certain pension adjustments, unrealized gains and losses on certain investments in debt and equity securities, other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses related to factors other than credit losses on available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities that an entity does not intend to sell and it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis, as well as changes in the fair value of derivatives related to the effective portion of a designated cash flow hedge.

AdditionalPaidInCapitalCommonStock.label: Additional Paid in Capital, Common Stock
AdditionalPaidInCapitalCommonStock.description: Value received from shareholders in common stock-related transactions that are in excess of par value or stated value and amounts received from other stock-related transactions. Includes only common stock transactions (excludes preferred stock transactions). May be called contributed capital, capital in excess of par, capital surplus, or paid-in capital.

AdjustmentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForSha.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Decrease for Tax Withholding Obligation
AdjustmentsRelatedToTaxWithholdingForSha.description: Amount of decrease to equity for grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Increase for Cost Recognition
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.description: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for award under share-based payment arrangement.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalTaxE.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Income Tax Benefit from Share-based Compensation
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalTaxE.description: Amount of increase in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a tax benefit associated with share-based compensation plan other than an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes, but is not limited to, excess tax benefit.

AdvertisingExpense.label: Advertising Expense
AdvertisingExpense.description: Amount charged to advertising expense for the period, which are expenses incurred with the objective of increasing revenue for a specified brand, product or product line.

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.description: Amount of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes amount capitalized.

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpenseNe.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense, after Tax
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpenseNe.description: Amount, after tax, of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableCu.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as current.

AmortizationOfDebtDiscountPremium.label: Amortization of Debt Discount (Premium)
AmortizationOfDebtDiscountPremium.description: Amount of noncash expense included in interest expense to amortize debt discount and premium associated with the related debt instruments. Excludes amortization of financing costs. Alternate captions include noncash interest expense.

AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs
AmortizationOfFinancingCosts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt issuance costs.

AmortizationOfFinancingCostsAndDiscounts.label: Amortization of Debt Issuance Costs and Discounts
AmortizationOfFinancingCostsAndDiscounts.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.label: Amortization of Intangible Assets
AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets.description: The aggregate expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of intangible assets (nonphysical assets not used in production) in a systematic and rational manner to the periods expected to benefit from such assets. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

AociIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncon.label: AOCI Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest, Tax
AociIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncon.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest.

AssetImpairmentCharges.label: Asset Impairment Charges
AssetImpairmentCharges.description: Amount of write-down of assets recognized in the income statement. Includes, but is not limited to, losses from tangible assets, intangible assets and goodwill.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AssetsCurrent.label: Assets, Current
AssetsCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are expected to be realized in cash, sold, or consumed within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesEquitySecuriti.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Equity Securities, Current
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesEquitySecuriti.description: Amount of investments in equity securities and other forms of securities that provide ownership interests classified as available-for-sale, expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossRealizedG.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Gross Realized Gains
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesGrossRealizedG.description: This item represents the gross profit realized on the sale of debt or equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

AvailableforsaleSecuritiesGrossRealizedG.label: Available-for-sale Securities, Gross Realized Gain (Loss), Excluding Other than Temporary Impairments
AvailableforsaleSecuritiesGrossRealizedG.description: This item represents the difference between the gross realized gains and losses realized on the sale of debt or equity securities categorized neither as held-to-maturity nor trading securities.

BusinessAcquisitionSharePrice.label: Business Acquisition, Share Price
BusinessAcquisitionSharePrice.description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks paid or offered to be paid in a business combination.

BusinessCombinationAcquisitionOfLessThan.label: Business Combination, Acquisition of Less than 100 Percent, Noncontrolling Interest, Fair Value
BusinessCombinationAcquisitionOfLessThan.description: This element represents the fair value of the noncontrolling interest in the acquiree at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred
BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.description: Amount of consideration transferred, consisting of acquisition-date fair value of assets transferred by the acquirer, liabilities incurred by the acquirer, and equity interest issued by the acquirer.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Cash and Equivalents
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, acquired at the acquisition date. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Assets, Other
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of other assets expected to be realized or consumed before one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Current Liabilities, Other
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of other liabilities due within one year or within the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Noncurrent Liabilities, Other
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of other liabilities due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Other Noncurrent Assets
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of other assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired, Goodwill, and Liabilities Assumed, Less Noncontrolling Interest
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount recognized as of the acquisition date for the assets, including goodwill, in excess of (less than) the aggregate liabilities assumed, less the noncontrolling interest in the acquiree.

CapitalizedComputerSoftwareAdditions.label: Capitalized Computer Software, Additions
CapitalizedComputerSoftwareAdditions.description: Additions made to capitalized computer software costs during the period.

CapitalizedComputerSoftwareAmortization.label: Capitalized Computer Software, Amortization (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
CapitalizedComputerSoftwareAmortization.description: For each income statement presented, the amount charged to expense for amortization of capitalized computer software costs.

CapitalizedComputerSoftwareAmortization1.label: Capitalized Computer Software, Amortization
CapitalizedComputerSoftwareAmortization1.description: Amount of expense for amortization of capitalized computer software costs.

CapitalizedComputerSoftwareImpairments1.label: Capitalized Computer Software, Impairments
CapitalizedComputerSoftwareImpairments1.description: Amount of impairment loss from capitalized computer software costs.

CapitalLeasedAssetsGross.label: Capital Leased Assets, Gross
CapitalLeasedAssetsGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of leased physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

CapitalLeaseObligations.label: Capital Lease Obligations
CapitalLeaseObligations.description: Amount equal to the present value (the principal) at the beginning of the lease term of minimum lease payments during the lease term (excluding that portion of the payments representing executory costs such as insurance, maintenance, and taxes to be paid by the lessor, together with any profit thereon) net of payments or other amounts applied to the principal through the balance sheet date.

CapitalLeaseObligationsIncurred.label: Lease Obligation Incurred
CapitalLeaseObligationsIncurred.description: Amount of increase in lease obligation from new lease.

CapitalLeasesBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorCl.label: Capital Leases, Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Net
CapitalLeasesBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorCl.description: The total gross amount less the charge for the use of the long-lived depreciable assets subject to a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueCur.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueCur.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Five Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Four Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInF.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Three Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due in Two Years
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueInT.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueThe.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due Thereafter
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueThe.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByM.label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Accumulated Depreciation
CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByM.description: The total charge for the use of long-lived depreciable assets subject to a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization.

CapitalUnits.label: Capital Units, Value
CapitalUnits.description: Value of capital units or capital shares. This element is relevant to issuers of face-amount certificates and registered investment companies.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareCashPaid.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Cash Paid
CommonStockDividendsPerShareCashPaid.description: Aggregate dividends paid during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.label: Common Stock, Dividends, Per Share, Declared
CommonStockDividendsPerShareDeclared.description: Aggregate dividends declared during the period for each share of common stock outstanding.

CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Common Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
CommonStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of common stock.

CommonStockSharesAuthorized.label: Common Stock, Shares Authorized
CommonStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of common shares permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

CommonStockSharesIssued.label: Common Stock, Shares, Issued
CommonStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.

CommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Common Stock, Shares, Outstanding
CommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Number of shares of common stock outstanding. Common stock represent the ownership interest in a corporation.

CommonStockValue.label: Common Stock, Value, Issued
CommonStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableT.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxAttributableT.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income (loss) and other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to noncontrolling interests. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPort.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ComprehensiveIncomeNetOfTaxIncludingPort.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

ContractWithCustomerAssetNet.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, after Allowance for Credit Loss
ContractWithCustomerAssetNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Current
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityCurrent.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

ContractWithCustomerLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Noncurrent
ContractWithCustomerLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as noncurrent.

CostOfRevenue.label: Cost of Revenue
CostOfRevenue.description: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

CostsAndExpenses.label: Costs and Expenses
CostsAndExpenses.description: Total costs of sales and operating expenses for the period.

CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Federal Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentFederalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current federal tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentForeignTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Foreign Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentForeignTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to taxable income (loss) from continuing operations.

CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Current State and Local Tax Expense (Benefit)
CurrentStateAndLocalTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current state and local tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

CustomerAdvancesAndDepositsCurrent.label: Customer Advances and Deposits, Current
CustomerAdvancesAndDepositsCurrent.description: The current portion of aggregate prepayments received from customers for goods or services to be provided in the future, as well as the current portion of money or property received from customers that are to be returned upon satisfactory contract completion or as partial prepayment for goods or services to be provided in the future.

DebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.label: Debt and Lease Obligation
DebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.description: Amount of short-term and long-term debt and lease obligation.

DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.label: Long-term Debt, Gross
DebtInstrumentCarryingAmount.description: Amount, before unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but is not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, commercial loans, mortgage loans, convertible debt, subordinated debt and other types of debt.

DebtInstrumentPeriodicPaymentPrincipal.label: Debt Instrument, Periodic Payment, Principal
DebtInstrumentPeriodicPaymentPrincipal.description: Amount of the required periodic payments applied to principal.

DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscount.label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount
DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscount.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt discount.

DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremium.label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount (Premium), Net
DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremium.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt discount (premium).

DebtIssuanceCosts.label: Debt Issuance Cost (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
DebtIssuanceCosts.description: Amount of debt issuance costs (for example, but not limited to, legal, accounting, broker, and regulatory fees).

DebtIssuanceCostsLineOfCreditArrangement.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Line of Credit Arrangements, Net
DebtIssuanceCostsLineOfCreditArrangement.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs related to line of credit arrangements. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredFederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Federal Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredFederalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred federal income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredFinanceCostsCurrentNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Current, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsCurrentNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredFinanceCostsNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredFinanceCostsNoncurrentNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Noncurrent, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNoncurrentNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredForeignIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Foreign Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredForeignIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred foreign income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Assets, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Deferred Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
DeferredIncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to income (loss) from continuing operations.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Gross
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilities.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

DeferredRevenueCurrent.label: Deferred Revenue, Current
DeferredRevenueCurrent.description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable, classified as current.

DeferredTaxAssetIntraEntityTransferAsset.label: Deferred Tax Asset, Intra-entity Transfer, Asset Other than Inventory
DeferredTaxAssetIntraEntityTransferAsset.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary difference from intra-entity transfer of asset within consolidated group. Excludes intra-entity transfer of inventory.

DeferredTaxAssetsGoodwillAndIntangibleAs.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Goodwill and Intangible Assets
DeferredTaxAssetsGoodwillAndIntangibleAs.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from intangible assets including goodwill.

DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net
DeferredTaxAssetsLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxAssetsNet.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsNet.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsNetCurrent.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance, Current
DeferredTaxAssetsNetCurrent.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards classified as current.

DeferredTaxAssetsNetNoncurrent.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Net of Valuation Allowance, Noncurrent
DeferredTaxAssetsNetNoncurrent.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards classified as noncurrent.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, Not Subject to Expiration
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards that are not subject to expiration dates.

DeferredTaxAssetsOther.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Other
DeferredTaxAssetsOther.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences, classified as other.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwardsA.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Credit Carryforwards, Alternative Minimum Tax
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwardsA.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible alternative minimum tax credit carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Share-based Compensation Cost
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from share-based compensation.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Allowance for Doubtful Accounts
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the allowance for doubtful accounts.

DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.description: Amount of deferred tax assets for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

DeferredTaxLiabilities.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredTaxLiabilities.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences without jurisdictional netting.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net, Current
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting and classified as current.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net, Noncurrent
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesNoncurrent.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting and classified as noncurrent.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Other
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesOther.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences classified as other.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEq.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Property, Plant and Equipment
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPropertyPlantAndEq.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from property, plant, and equipment.

DeferredTaxLiabilityNotRecognizedAmountO.label: Deferred Tax Liability Not Recognized, Amount of Unrecognized Deferred Tax Liability, Undistributed Earnings of Foreign Subsidiaries
DeferredTaxLiabilityNotRecognizedAmountO.description: Amount of deferred tax liability not recognized because of the exceptions to comprehensive recognition of deferred taxes related to undistributed earnings of foreign subsidiaries.

DefinedBenefitPlanAssetsForPlanBenefitsN.label: Assets for Plan Benefits, Defined Benefit Plan
DefinedBenefitPlanAssetsForPlanBenefitsN.description: Amount of asset, recognized in statement of financial position, for overfunded defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans.

DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligation.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Benefit Obligation
DefinedBenefitPlanBenefitObligation.description: Amount of actuarial present value of benefits attributed to service rendered by employee for defined benefit plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanContributionsByEmploye.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Contributions by Employer
DefinedBenefitPlanContributionsByEmploye.description: Amount of contribution received by defined benefit plan from employer which increases plan assets.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureEmployer.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Employer Contributions, Next Fiscal Year
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureEmployer.description: Amount of contribution expected to be received by defined benefit plan from employer in next fiscal year following current fiscal year.

DefinedBenefitPlansEstimatedFutureEmploy.label: Defined Benefit Plans, Estimated Future Employer Contributions in Current Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlansEstimatedFutureEmploy.description: Amount of employer's best estimate of contributions expected to be paid to the plan in the current remaining fiscal period.

DefinedBenefitPlansEstimatedFutureEmploy.label: Defined Benefit Plans, Estimated Future Employer Contributions in Next Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlansEstimatedFutureEmploy.description: Amount of employer's best estimate of contributions expected to be paid to the plan during the next fiscal year beginning after the date of the latest statement of financial position.

DefinedContributionPlanCostRecognized.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Cost
DefinedContributionPlanCostRecognized.description: Amount of cost for defined contribution plan.

Depreciation.label: Depreciation
Depreciation.description: The amount of expense recognized in the current period that reflects the allocation of the cost of tangible assets over the assets' useful lives. Includes production and non-production related depreciation.

DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.label: Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization
DepreciationDepletionAndAmortization.description: The aggregate expense recognized in the current period that allocates the cost of tangible assets, intangible assets, or depleting assets to periods that benefit from use of the assets.

DerivativeAssetFairValueGrossLiability.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Gross Liability
DerivativeAssetFairValueGrossLiability.description: Fair value of liability associated with financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset.

DerivativeAssetsCurrent.label: Derivative Asset, Current
DerivativeAssetsCurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeAssetsLiabilitiesAtFairValueNe.label: Derivative Assets (Liabilities), at Fair Value, Net
DerivativeAssetsLiabilitiesAtFairValueNe.description: Fair values as of the balance sheet date of the net amount of all assets and liabilities resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments.

DerivativeAssetsNoncurrent.label: Derivative Asset, Noncurrent
DerivativeAssetsNoncurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAsset.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Gross Asset
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAsset.description: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAssetAmou.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Amount Not Offset Against Collateral
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeAssetAmou.description: Fair value, after offset of derivative liability, of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, before offset against an obligation to return collateral under a master netting arrangement. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value, Gross Liability
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeLiability.description: Fair value, before effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeNet.label: Derivative, Fair Value, Net
DerivativeFairValueOfDerivativeNet.description: Fair value of the assets less the liabilities of a derivative or group of derivatives.

DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.label: Derivative, Gain (Loss) on Derivative, Net
DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives recognized in the income statement.

DerivativeInstrumentsLossRecognizedInOth.label: Derivative Instruments, Loss Recognized in Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Effective Portion (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
DerivativeInstrumentsLossRecognizedInOth.description: The effective portion of losses on derivative instruments designated and qualifying as hedging instruments that was recognized in other comprehensive income during the current period.

DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedg.label: Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments, Asset, at Fair Value
DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedg.description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of derivative instrument not designated as hedging instrument and classified as an asset.

DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalO.label: Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) on Disposal of Discontinued Operation, Net of Tax
DiscontinuedOperationGainLossOnDisposalO.description: Amount after tax of gain (loss) not previously recognized resulting from the disposal of a discontinued operation.

DiscontinuedOperationProvisionForLossGai.label: Discontinued Operation, Provision for Loss (Gain) on Disposal, before Income Tax
DiscontinuedOperationProvisionForLossGai.description: Amount before tax of (gain) loss recognized for the (reversal of write-down) write-down to fair value, less cost to sell, of a discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Deferred Tax Liabilities
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as deferred tax liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

DividendsCommonStock.label: Dividends, Common Stock
DividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash, stock and payment-in-kind (PIK).

DividendsCommonStockCash.label: Dividends, Common Stock, Cash
DividendsCommonStockCash.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in cash.

DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Dividends Payable
DividendsPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding.

EarningsPerShareBasic.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic
EarningsPerShareBasic.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

EarningsPerShareBasicAndDiluted.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic and Diluted
EarningsPerShareBasicAndDiluted.description: The amount of net income or loss for the period per each share in instances when basic and diluted earnings per share are the same amount and reported as a single line item on the face of the financial statements. Basic earnings per share is the amount of net income or loss for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period. Diluted earnings per share includes the amount of net income or loss for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

EarningsPerShareDiluted.label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted
EarningsPerShareDiluted.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateContinuingOperatio.description: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationAtFe.description: Percentage of domestic federal statutory tax rate applicable to pretax income (loss).

EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashAndCashEquival.label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash and Cash Equivalents
EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashAndCashEquival.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from the effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalent balances held in foreign currencies.

EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalent.label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents
EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalent.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies. Excludes amounts for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalent.label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Including Disposal Group and Discontinued Operations
EffectOfExchangeRateOnCashCashEquivalent.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies; including, but not limited to, disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

EmployeeRelatedLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Employee-related Liabilities, Current
EmployeeRelatedLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Total of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.description: Amount of cost not yet recognized for nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense, Tax Benefit
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.description: Amount of tax benefit for recognition of expense of award under share-based payment arrangement.

EquityMethodInvestmentRealizedGainLossOn.label: Equity Method Investment, Realized Gain (Loss) on Disposal
EquityMethodInvestmentRealizedGainLossOn.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of an equity method investment.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Current Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of current assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Current Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of current liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Noncurrent Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of noncurrent assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Noncurrent Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of noncurrent liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

FairValueInputsEntityCreditRisk.label: Fair Value Inputs, Entity Credit Risk (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
FairValueInputsEntityCreditRisk.description: Risk associated with risk of default, credit spread risk and downgrade risk, expressed as a percentage, used as an input to measure fair value.

FairValueInputsProbabilityOfDefault.label: Fair Value Inputs, Probability of Default (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
FairValueInputsProbabilityOfDefault.description: Percentage of likelihood a loan will not be repaid and instead default, used as an input to measure fair value.

FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.label: Finance Lease, Interest Expense
FinanceLeaseInterestExpense.description: Amount of interest expense on finance lease liability.

FinanceLeaseInterestPaymentOnLiability.label: Finance Lease, Interest Payment on Liability
FinanceLeaseInterestPaymentOnLiability.description: Amount of interest paid on finance lease liability.

FinanceLeaseLiability.label: Finance Lease, Liability
FinanceLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Current
FinanceLeaseLiabilityCurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as current.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
FinanceLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from finance lease, classified as noncurrent.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Payment, Due
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFive.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearFour.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearThre.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDueYearTwo.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOf.label: Finance Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
FinanceLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRemainderOf.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for finance lease to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.label: Finance Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
FinanceLeaseLiabilityUndiscountedExcessA.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for finance lease.

FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetAmortization.description: Amount of amortization expense attributable to right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.label: Finance Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
FinanceLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRateP.description: Weighted average discount rate for finance lease calculated at point in time.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsForeignCurren.label: Finite Lived Intangible Assets, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsForeignCurren.description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which increases (decreases) assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Net
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsNet.description: Amount after amortization of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsTranslationAd.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Translation Adjustments (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsTranslationAd.description: Amount of increase (decrease) to assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with a finite life for foreign currency translation adjustments.

FundsHeldForClients.label: Funds Held for Clients
FundsHeldForClients.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the funds held on behalf of others and that are expected to be liquidated within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer. This does not include funds held under reinsurance agreements.

GainLossOnInterestRateDerivativeInstrume.label: Gain (Loss) on Interest Rate Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments
GainLossOnInterestRateDerivativeInstrume.description: Amount of gain (loss) included in earnings for the period from the increase (decrease) in fair value of interest rate derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

GainOrLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiary.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Stock in Subsidiary
GainOrLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiary.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of equity in securities of subsidiaries.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt
GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebt.description: Difference between the fair value of payments made and the carrying amount of debt which is extinguished prior to maturity.

Goodwill.label: Goodwill
Goodwill.description: Amount after accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.label: Goodwill, Acquired During Period
GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.description: Amount of increase in asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized resulting from a business combination.

GoodwillForeignCurrencyTranslationGainLo.label: Goodwill, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
GoodwillForeignCurrencyTranslationGainLo.description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which increases (decreases) an asset representing future economic benefits from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillTransfers.label: Goodwill, Transfers
GoodwillTransfers.description: Amount of transfers into (out of) an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillTranslationAdjustments.label: Goodwill, Translation Adjustments (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
GoodwillTranslationAdjustments.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from foreign currency translation adjustments of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets Held-for-use
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsHeldForUse.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long lived assets held for use (including those held for disposal by means other than sale).

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the parent.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAttrib.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAttrib.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Domestic
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to domestic operations.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Foreign
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: The portion of earnings or loss from continuing operations before income taxes that is attributable to foreign operations, which is defined as Income or Loss generated from operations located outside the entity's country of domicile.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Equity Method Investments, Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsBefore.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations before deduction of income tax expense (benefit) and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest, and addition of income (loss) from equity method investments.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsInclud.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsInclud.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations including portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Basic Share
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.description: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerDil.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerDil.description: The amount of net income (loss) derived from continuing operations during the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Basic Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per basic share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments.description: Amount of income (loss) for proportionate share of equity method investee's income (loss).

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

IncomeTaxesPaidNet.label: Income Taxes Paid, Net
IncomeTaxesPaidNet.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period to foreign, federal, state, and local authorities as taxes on income, net of any cash received during the current period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInDeferredT.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Enacted Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationChangeInEnactedTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) in the income tax rates.

IncomeTaxReconciliationForeignIncomeTaxR.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Foreign Income Tax Rate Differential, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationForeignIncomeTaxR.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to foreign income tax expense (benefit).

IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation at Federal Statutory Income Tax Rate, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationIncomeTaxExpenseB.description: The amount of income tax expense or benefit for the period computed by applying the domestic federal statutory tax rates to pretax income from continuing operations.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible expenses.

IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherReconcilingI.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Other Reconciling Items, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationOtherReconcilingI.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to tax exempt income, equity in earnings (loss) of an unconsolidated subsidiary, minority noncontrolling interest income (loss), tax holiday, disposition of a business, disposition of an asset, repatriation of foreign earnings, repatriation of foreign earnings jobs creation act of 2004, increase (decrease) in enacted tax rate, prior year income taxes, increase (decrease) in deferred tax asset valuation allowance, and other adjustments.

IncomeTaxReconciliationPriorYearIncomeTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Prior Year Income Taxes, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationPriorYearIncomeTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to revisions of previously reported income tax expense (benefit).

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxContingencies.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Contingency, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxContingencies.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to increase (decrease) in income tax contingencies. Including, but not limited to, domestic tax contingency, foreign tax contingency, state and local tax contingency, and other contingencies.

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxExemptIncome.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Exempt Income, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxExemptIncome.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableAndAccr.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to vendors for goods and services received and the amount of obligations and expenses incurred but not paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in amount due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services.

IncreaseDecreaseInContractReceivablesNet.label: Increase (Decrease) in Contract Receivables, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInContractReceivablesNet.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables arising from the contracting of goods and services, net for uncollectible accounts.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Current Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in current assets classified as other.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCal.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Call Options and Warrants
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToCal.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of call options and warrants using the treasury stock method.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Share-based Payment Arrangements
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of share based payment arrangements using the treasury stock method.

IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsExcluding.label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsExcluding.description: Amount of assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit.

IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsForeignCu.label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets, Foreign Currency Translation Gain (Loss)
IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsForeignCu.description: Amount of foreign currency translation gain (loss) which increases (decreases) an asset, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit to fair value.

IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsWrittenOf.label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets, Written off Related to Sale of Business Unit
IndefiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsWrittenOf.description: Amount of divestiture of an asset lacking physical substance and having a projected indefinite period of benefit to fair value. Excludes financial assets and goodwill.

IndefinitelivedIntangibleAssetsAcquired.label: Indefinite-lived Intangible Assets Acquired
IndefinitelivedIntangibleAssetsAcquired.description: Amount of increase in assets, excluding financial assets and goodwill, lacking physical substance with an indefinite life, from an acquisition.

InterestCostsIncurredCapitalized.label: Capitalized Interest Costs, Including Allowance for Funds Used During Construction
InterestCostsIncurredCapitalized.description: Amount of interest capitalized, including amount of allowance for funds used during construction.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

InterestPayableCurrent.label: Interest Payable, Current
InterestPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of [accrued] interest payable on all forms of debt, including trade payables, that has been incurred and is unpaid. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

LeaseCost.label: Lease, Cost
LeaseCost.description: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
